overview: A newly married gay couple, still in their honeymoon phase, are disturbed when an old school-friend of the younger guy moves near by, and wants to re-establish their friendship. The older, more insecure partner, is immediately jealous, and asks another friend his age what he should do.  However everything is not the way it seems.
tagline: Iâ€™m your husband, not your teacher.
title: Stormy Honeymoon
